title: FS: 1905 JT Dye NY Giants Postcard
author: con40

posts.post_title: FS: 1905 JT Dye NY Giants Postcard
posts.post_content:
Featuring Matty and Iron Man! I came across one of these that is really clean and unmarked. See photos. Not really my collecting wheelhouse. No creases, though it has one light wrinkle in the top center (you can see it in the photo) and the photo surface does have some light cracks in it, but nothing chipping off. The back is super clean.

Asking $300 or BO.

[IMG]https://d28lcup14p4e72.cloudfront.net/1237/4081909/2018-09-21%2008.00.45.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]https://d28lcup14p4e72.cloudfront.net/1237/4081910/2018-09-21%2008.00.59.jpg[/IMG]
